div.p: These are the Resource Profiles as designed by the eLTSS project.
The eLTSS Implementation Guide follows the Must Support requirements as defined in US Core.

The eLTSS IG contains eLTSS Profiles to show the mapping of the eLTSS Dataset to FHIR elements. Many Profiles will only contain this mapping in the "Description & Constraints" column of the Differential Table. eLTSS Profiles that are derived from US Core Profiles will only contain additional constraints in the Differential Table that support eLTSS requirements. The US Core constraints will be present in the Snapshot Table.

tr.td: Base profile that defines the CarePlan constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the Claim constraints for eLTSS.

Defines the Condition constraints for eLTSS. Not all SNOMED codes for potential conditions (assessed needs) are included in the value set. For additional code requirements, please submit a request to the eLTSS Confluence page
Defines the Contract constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the EpisodeOfCare constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the Goal constraints for eLTSS.

Defines the Location constraints for eLTSS. This profile should only be used for Service Delivery Address when the service or support is provided outside the person's home address. Use Person.address when service or support is provided in the person's residence.
Defines the Observation constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the Patient/Person constraints for eLTSS.

td.p: This profile sets minimum expectations for the RelatedPerson resource to record, search, and fetch basic administrative information about persons with a legal or familial relationship to a patient. It is patterned off of USCORE.

tr.td: Defines the Practitioner constraints for eLTSS.

td.p: Defines the PractitionerRole constraints for eLTSS
Defines the QuestionnaireResponse constraints for eLTSS

tr.td: Defines the Questionnaire constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the RiskAssessment constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the ServiceRequest constraints for eLTSS.
